comments.body: This seems fine but if you're just looking for longer delays, randint(5,10) or something?
Maybe i had to add a comment from the original PR .. it has actually a reason for that https://github.com/apache/spark/pull/30277#discussion_r519038459

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +128,132 @@        def context_barrier(x):
            tc = BarrierTaskContext.get()
            time.sleep(random.randint(1, 5) * 2)
            tc.barrier()
            return time.time()
